article: the president used his nobel peace prize lecture in oslo as a forum to explain the obama doctrine of foreign policy , one flexible enough to allow him to escalate the war in afghanistan while calling for greater global cooperation in fighting poverty , global warming and advocating human rights around the world .
abstract: obama uses nobel speech to explain his foreign policy doctrine
